laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Thyroid function test (Free T3 and Free T4)
laboratory_examinations.findings: FT3 and FT4 slightly above elevated prepregnancy levels.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At 6-7 wk gestation, FT3 and FT4 increased in parallel with hCG levels.
TSH remained below normal limits until 28 wk gestation.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Thyroid function test (Free T3 and Free T4)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms subsided and thyroid hormone levels were slightly below prepregnancy levels during the third trimester.

laboratory_examinations.findings: TSH was 4.6 mU/liter, FT3 was 10.9 pmol/liter, FT4 was 28.3 pmol/liter.
